scripts.copy: mkdir -p build && cp -r node_modules/@jpmorganchase/perspective/build/* build && cp -r node_modules/@jpmorganchase/perspective-viewer/build/* build && cp -r node_modules/@jpmorganchase/perspective-viewer-hypergrid/build/* build && cp -r node_modules/@jpmorganchase/perspective-viewer-highcharts/build/* build && cp src/html/* build && cp src/json/* build && cp src/csv/* build && cp src/css/* build && cp src/js/* build
